fields.text: Welcome to Strava, the number one app for runners and cyclists in San Francisco.
To track a run or cycling activity and view your performance data, press [INDEX].
To start a new activity recording, press [INDEX].
Please hold the line while we connect you to our activity setup team.
To review your past workouts and stats, press [INDEX].
Please hold the line while we retrieve your activity history.
For account and subscription support, press [INDEX].
For billing and subscription questions, press [INDEX].
Please hold the line while we connect you to our billing specialists.
For technical assistance with the Strava app, press [INDEX].
Please hold the line while we connect you to technical support.
